name: SandWarriors: Battle for the Sun Throne
name_original: SandWarriors: Battle for the Sun Throne
description:
SandWarriors: Battle for the Sun Throne is a simulation game developed by Gremlin Interactive. It came out on 01-04-1997. It was published by Interplay Productions.
SandWarriors: Battle for the Sun Throne is available on PC.
